ja så venter vi ALLE et par dage , ikke !

Cant's seem to get the subtitles working, though. Says in menu that is has danish etc, but when choosing it, still no subs. And cant choose them from right clicking in-movie (windows media player). So did they get stripped?

English language, though.

Im so f-ing tired om all noobs.
